```{r K2}
#k2_anno_cluster = read.table('go_david/k2_annotation_clustering.txt',
k2_anno_cluster = read.table('k1/developmental_protein.screenshot.txt', header=T,sep="\t",skipNul=T,row.names = 1)
k2_anno_cluster$X.1 = NULL
k2_anno_cluster$gene = factor(rownames(k2_anno_cluster), levels=rownames(k2_anno_cluster), ordered=T)
library(pheatmap)
library(reshape2)
library(ggplot2)

k2_anno_cluster.long = melt(k2_anno_cluster)
#k2_anno_cluster.long = melt(k2_anno_cluster[1:148,])
tileplot<-ggplot(k2_anno_cluster.long, aes(y=gene, x=variable,)) + 
  geom_tile(aes(fill=as.factor(value)),color="white") + 
  scale_fill_manual(values=c("black","green")) + 
  coord_equal() +
  theme(
    axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, vjust = 0.5, hjust=1),
    axis.ticks.y = element_blank(),
    axis.text.y = element_text(size = 6))

pdf(file="tileplot.pdf")
tileplot
dev.off()
```
